Speaker: Donald Trump
Text: Hello, Frances. How are you?

Speaker: Frances Watson
Text: [Laughs] Hello, Mr. President. I am actually doing very well.

Speaker: Donald Trump
Text: Good. Well, you have a big fan in our, our great chief, right? Chief of Staff, Mark. [Crosstalk]

Speaker: Frances Watson
Text: I did, I, I, I met him. I, um, I -- It was a pleasure to meet him yesterday.

Speaker: Donald Trump
Text: Nah, he's great. He's a great -- He's been successful. He was a great Congressman, and then, when you lead by 35 points it's hard to get people outta there, but I tried very ha -- for two years and we got him. And he's, and he's done a -- Uh, he's done a fantastic job. I just wanted to thank you for everything.

Speaker: Donald Trump
Text: He told me you've been great, and you know, look, this country is counting on it, 'cause -- Uh, it's very interesting. So I won Florida in a record number, Ohio in a record, Texas in record, Alabama by 40, 40 points. And I won everything but Georgia, and I -- You know, and I won Georgia, I know that, by a lot.

Speaker: Donald Trump
Text: And the people know it. And, uh, you know, something happened, uh, I mean, something bad happened, and I hope you're doing that, uh, that stop, because if you're -- Uh, you know, I hope you're going back two years, as opposed to just checking, you know, one against the other, 'cause that would just sort of a, uh, ya -- a signature check that didn't mean anything.

Speaker: Donald Trump
Text: But if you go back two years, and if you can get to Fulton, you're gonna find things that are gonna be unbelievable the, the dishonesty that we'll -- that, uh, that we've heard from them.

Speaker: Frances Watson
Text: Yeah, right.

Speaker: Donald Trump
Text: You know, just good sources. Really good --

Speaker: Frances Watson
Text: Right.

Speaker: Donald Trump
Text: -- sources. But Fulton, Fulton is the mother lode, you know, as the expression goes, Fulton County, and --

Speaker: Frances Watson
Text: Right.

Speaker: Frances Watson
Text: Well, Mr. President --

Speaker: Donald Trump
Text: -- but you don't wanna see, you know, you [Crosstalk] --

Speaker: Frances Watson
Text: Right, yeah, uh, y -- I, I, I appreciate your comment, and, and I, I can assure you that our team and the GBI, that we're only interested in --

Speaker: Donald Trump
Text: Right.

Speaker: Frances Watson
Text: -- in, in the truth, and, and finding --

Speaker: Donald Trump
Text: Right.

Speaker: Frances Watson
Text: -- you know --

Speaker: Donald Trump
Text: That's great.

Speaker: Frances Watson
Text: -- finding the information that's based on the facts, and, you know, we've --

Speaker: Donald Trump
Text: [Crosstalk]

Speaker: Frances Watson
Text: -- we've been working on 12, 16-hour days, and --

Speaker: Donald Trump
Text: Great.

Speaker: Frances Watson
Text: -- y -- you know, we're, we're working through it. And, um, so I can assure you that, and, um, I, I do appreciate you calling. I know that you're a ver -- very busy, very important, uh, man, and, and I'm very honored that, that you called, and, you know, am --

Speaker: Donald Trump
Text: Well, it's --

Speaker: Frances Watson
Text: -- am, quite --

Speaker: Donald Trump
Text: -- so important what you're doing.

Speaker: Frances Watson
Text: -- quite, um -- Quite frankly, I -- I -- I'm shocked and that, that you would --

Speaker: Donald Trump
Text: [Laughs]

Speaker: Frances Watson
Text: -- you would take time to, to do that, but --

Speaker: Donald Trump
Text: Yeah.

Speaker: Frances Watson
Text: -- I am very appreciative.

Speaker: Donald Trump
Text: No, Mark asked me to do it. He s -- He thinks you're great. And, you know, it's just you have the most important job in the country right now, because if we win Georgia, first of all if we win, you're gonna have two wins so, uh -- Well, you're not -- They're not gonna win right now. You know, they're down because the people of Georgia are so angry at what happened to me.

Speaker: Donald Trump
Text: They know I won, won by hundreds of thousands of votes. It wasn't close. And Alabama, you know, where they go -- 'cause I won, uh, South Carolina in a record, Alabama in a record, Florida in a record. You know, I won Florida by six or 700,000 votes. It's never happened before with a Republican. And, uh, with all the money they spent.

Speaker: Donald Trump
Text: You know, you heard all that, these guys going down and spending a fortune. And we won Texas by a record. Texas was run -- won by the biggest, uh, biggest number ever. And it, you know, it didn't, uh, it didn't -- And, and Ohio, of course, you know that, you know about that. That was won by nine points or something, and it's -- All of it.

Speaker: Donald Trump
Text: Iowa, I mean -- And it didn't -- It never made sense, and, you know, they dropped ballots. They dropped all these ballots. Uh, Stacy Abrams, a really, really terrible. I mean, just a terrible thing. And I will say this, if, if it went, hopef -- I mean, hopefully, this will show, because if you go back two years or four years, you're gonna see it's a totally different signature, but, but hopefully, uh, uh, you know, I will t -- When, when the right answer comes out, you'll be praised.

Speaker: Donald Trump
Text: I mean, I don't know why, you know, they've, they've made it so hard. They, they will be praised. The people will say, "Great," because that's what it's about, that ability to check and to, and to make it right, 'cause everyone knows it's wrong. There's just no way. You know, they had people in Georgia, for instance, that won, and I was way ahead of them, and they won because of me, you know, I pulled them.

Speaker: Donald Trump
Text: Uh, they call it coattails, right? And we pulled them across, and they say, "There's no way that I beat you by 15 points." You know? I've had that in, uh -- We've had plenty of those calls, too. So, anyway, but whatever you can do, Frances, it would be, uh -- It's a great thing. It's an important thing for the country, so important.

Speaker: Donald Trump
Text: You have no idea, so important.

Speaker: Frances Watson
Text: Well, Mr. --

Speaker: Donald Trump
Text: And I very much appreciate it.

Speaker: Frances Watson
Text: Well, I, I appreciate your call, and, I, I hope you and your family have a very healthy, and, and happy Christmas, and, um --

Speaker: Donald Trump
Text: Great.

Speaker: Frances Watson
Text: -- and, I, I certainly, uh, appreciate you and, and everything that you've done.

Speaker: Donald Trump
Text: Well, and I appreciate it, too, Frances. Uh, do you think they'll be working after Christmas, uh, to keep it going fast? 'Cause you know, we have that date of the 6th, which is a very important date --

Speaker: Frances Watson
Text: Right, right.

Speaker: Donald Trump
Text: -- and, uh --

Speaker: Frances Watson
Text: I, I --

Speaker: Donald Trump
Text: [Crosstalk]

Speaker: Frances Watson
Text: -- uh, I know, I know you've got that coming up, and, and I, I, I can assure you that, that, you know, I -- I'm, I'm going to be working, uh, and, and we're gonna be working, and it's, um --

Speaker: Donald Trump
Text: Good.

Speaker: Frances Watson
Text: I, um -- Yeah, I, I appreciate it, and, you know, our t -- our team's out there working. You know, um, we c -- we got pandemic --

Speaker: Donald Trump
Text: Well I do thank them.

Speaker: Frances Watson
Text: Yeah, we've got pan --

Speaker: Donald Trump
Text: And I hear the, uh, I hear the Georgia, it's, it's not the FBL, what was it? The GBI, right?

Speaker: Frances Watson
Text: Right.

Speaker: Donald Trump
Text: Right, but I hear, uh, I hear they're fantastic, and I hear I'm at about 96% with them. So that's good, okay?

Speaker: Frances Watson
Text: [Laughs]

Speaker: Donald Trump
Text: But, uh, say hello to those guys.

Speaker: Donald Trump
Text: Tell 'em I appreciate it very much. Let 'em all know.

Speaker: Frances Watson
Text: I will certainly do --

Speaker: Donald Trump
Text: Okay?

Speaker: Frances Watson
Text: -- that.

Speaker: Donald Trump
Text: You just take care. Call anytime you need. If you need help, call me, but, but, uh, Mark has the number, but, uh, Mark appreciates it, but I wanted to call you and thank you.

Speaker: Frances Watson
Text: Well, tha -- thank you so much and you have a good evening.

Speaker: Donald Trump
Text: Thanks, Frances. Take --

Speaker: Frances Watson
Text: All right.

Speaker: Donald Trump
Text: -- care. Have a good Christmas and everything. So long. Thanks, Frances.

Speaker: Frances Watson
Text: Tha -- thank you. Bye-bye.

Speaker: Donald Trump
Text: Appreciate it. Bye.
